import { Backdrop, CircularProgress } from '@mui/material'; import React, { useState } from 'react'; function TwseRecommendComp() { var Today = new Date() const todayDate = Today.getFullYear() + "-" + String(Today.getMonth()+1).padStart(2, '0') + "-" + String(Today.getDate()).padStart(2, '0') const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState("2023-01-01") const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(todayDate) const [loading, setLoading] = useState(false) return ( <> theme.zIndex.drawer + 1 }} open = { loading } > 資料載入中
